thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au
thread.title: Michelle G
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by Michelle G

author: Michelle G
title: Michelle G
text: It is good to know that Store DJ stands by customers when there is a problem. Warranty return was a breeze, the advice was very informative. I watched a salesman who was assisting a customer with a 10M cable. He got his tape measure out to demonstrate that it was not what the customer needed. He purchased the 5M cable instead, which best suited his needs. It is great to have trust with a store. I can rely on the advice and service when I am supporting my 15 year old son reach his goals and dreams as a musician.
